categories: Category:Star Wars: The Jedi Academy Trilogy

nodes.text: Star Wars: The Jedi Academy Trilogy (omnibus)

Star Wars: The Jedi Academy Trilogy is a Star Wars Legends Science Fiction Book Club hardcover exclusive that collects The Jedi Academy Trilogy novel series from author Kevin J. Anderson. It was published by GuildAmerica Books, an imprint of the Science Fiction Book Club, by arrangement with Bantam Books in 1994.
